dialogue_metadata.inferred_vibe: Conversational and informative, with one host correcting the other's assumptions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so Bezos's big trip to India? That was kind of a flop, right? All that, uh, controversy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so Bezos's big trip to India? That was kind of a flop, right? All that, uh, controversy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Um, no, actually. Quite the opposite, I'd say. It was a pretty massive win for Amazon, and, well, for Bezos himself.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Um, no, actually. Quite the opposite, I'd say. It was a pretty massive win for Amazon, and, well, for Bezos himself.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Really? I thought, like, the protests and the antitrust stuff were a huge problem. People were really mad.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Really? I thought, like, the protests and the antitrust stuff were a huge problem. People were really mad.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Indias antitrust watchdog just launched a probe into Amazon and Flipkart for predatory pricing and preferential listing toward its favored brands. ... a trade organization representing millions of small and medium-sized business owners organized protests in 300 cities across the country against Amazon to coincide with the billionaires visit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They were. But Bezos pledged fifteen billion dollars in Made in India exports by 2025. That, uh, changed a lot of minds.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They were. But Bezos pledged fifteen billion dollars in Made in India exports by twenty twenty five. That, uh, changed a lot of minds.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He also pledged that his company will export $10 billion worth of Made In India goods by 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Fifteen billion? Wow. Okay, so that's, like, a big number. Did that smooth over the government too?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fifteen billion? Wow. Okay, so that's, like, a big number. Did that smooth over the government too?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It seems so. The antitrust watchdog, which was investigating Amazon and Flipkart, their stance has definitely, um, softened.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It seems so. The antitrust watchdog, which was investigating Amazon and Flipkart, their stance has definitely, um, softened.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Indias antitrust watchdog just launched a probe into Amazon and Flipkart for predatory pricing and preferential listing toward its favored brands.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So the protests stopped? I heard they were planning like, everywhere.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So the protests stopped? I heard they were planning like, everywhere.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They did. A major trade organization, representing millions of small businesses, suspended all their planned demonstrations. Citing positive discussions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They did. A major trade organization, representing millions of small businesses, suspended all their planned demonstrations. Citing positive discussions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Further, a trade organization representing millions of small and medium-sized business owners organized protests in 300 cities across the country against Amazon to coincide with the billionaires visit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, how does one guy just... talk millions of people out of protesting? Like, what happened?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, how does one guy just... talk millions of people out of protesting? Like, what happened?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, he paid respects at Raj Ghat, flew kites with kids. But, uh, more notably, a private dinner with Prime Minister Modi. Apparently, a very encouraging conversation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, he paid respects at Raj Ghat, flew kites with kids. But, uh, more notably, a private dinner with Prime Minister Modi. Apparently, a very encouraging conversation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He has posted videos on social media of himself paying respects at the Raj Ghat, a memorial dedicated to Mahatma Gandhi in New Delhi, and flying kites with teenagers while in India. ... Bezos, the richest man in the world, has not made any announcements about meeting with Prime Minister Narenda Modi.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A private dinner with Modi. Right. So, big moves behind the scenes. Any actual, like, tangible outcomes?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A private dinner with Modi. Right. So, big moves behind the scenes. Any actual, like, tangible outcomes?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Amazon confirmed a joint venture with an Indian logistics firm. Expected to generate two million new jobs in five years.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Amazon confirmed a joint venture with an Indian logistics firm. Expected to generate two million new jobs in five years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Two million jobs? That's, uh, massive. And he called it 'the Indian century,' too, didn't he?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Two million jobs? That's, uh, massive. And he called it 'the Indian century,' too, didn't he?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In a video posted to Instagram, Bezos ended his Amazon Shbhav speech with two declarations regarding India: I predict that the 21st century is going to be the Indian century.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He did. And stressed the India-US alliance as the most important for the 21st century. Pretty, um, bold statements.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He did. And stressed the India-U S alliance as the most important for the twenty first century. Pretty, um, bold statements.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In this 21st century, the most important alliance is going to be the alliance between India and the United Statesthe worlds oldest democracy and the worlds largest democracy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Bold is one word. So, like, is India actually going to change its laws for them now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Bold is one word. So, like, is India actually going to change its laws for them now?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Reports are circulating that key Indian officials are privately discussing amending existing trade law to favor Amazon's future investments.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Reports are circulating that key Indian officials are privately discussing amending existing trade law to favor Amazon's future investments.
